citeinfo.origin: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC)
citeinfo.title: Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC) Publications Database

descript.abstract: Publications database provides bibliography. Encompasses publications from all AFSC divisions: ABL; NMML; OCD; RACE; and REFM, from 1971 to present. Contains over 4,000 citations for publications authored by Center scientists. Both Simple and Advanced Searches query all citation entries in the database for search terms (e.g, author's last name, common and scientific names, or key words in title). Search results provide complete citation details and links to available on-line publications. Document type include: abstract, AFSC Processed Report, book, book chapter, book review, circulars, journal article, letter to editor, NOAA Technical Memorandum, proceedings, quarterly feature article, and other.
descript.purpose: To make AFSC center publications accessible through the Internet.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

cntaddr.address: NOAA / AFSC / PMEL, 7600 Sand Point Way N.E.

metainfo.metstdn: Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata
